name: recumbency
content:
Add to word list

the position of lying down or leaning back so you are almost lying down, or time spent in this position: The chest pain is aggravated by coughing or recumbency. Due to the patient’s prolonged recumbency, there is an increased risk of thrombosis. Symptoms that are provoked on standing are relieved by recumbence.
